caption.p: Daily trend of asymptomatic persons who tested positive for SARS-Cov-2 and were enforced to home self-isolation in Italy, from March 1 to June 30, 2020. Prevalence is expressed as percentage (orange line and left vertical axis) or odds (grey line ad right vertical axis). (For interpretation of the references to colour in this figure legend, the reader is referred to the Web version of this article.)
